EmailTemplate.subject: 3 Hours Could Save You 30% On Your Cloud Bill
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/product-3/why-turbonomic]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
A few days ago, I learned that in one hour, Turbonomic found $2M worth of additional savings annually in the AWS environment of a long-time CloudHealth customer – along with over 500 performance critical risks due to inadequate resources.
Turbonomic also recently uncovered:
- 30% additional monthly savings in a CloudCheckr (AWS) environment
- 40% additional monthly savings in a Cloudyn (Azure) environment
- 74% additional monthly savings in a highly-advanced custom tooling (AWS) environment
Would it be worth three hours of your time for Turbonomic to save you at least 30% off your annual cloud bill – and identify hidden performance risks before your customers do?
Let's chat. <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/?nab=1]]>
Regards, Elizabeth
